actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to designate Lawrence, Kansas, as a place of holding court for the District of Kansas.

summary.text: Provides that the U.S. District Court for the District of Kansas shall be held in Lawrence, Kansas, in addition to those places currently provided by law.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to designate Lawrence, Kansas, as a place of holding court for the District of Kansas.
